name: Alice Morgan
text_notes: I am applying to refinance after a temporary hardship; I had two late payments last year due to medical bills but have since returned to full-time work and increased my savings. I plan to use the funds to consolidate high interest debt.

name: Ben Turner
text_notes: Seeking a small business expansion loan. Last quarter cash flow was tight because of delayed customer payments, but I have a new contract that will raise revenue. I have unpaid invoices but expect them to clear next month.

name: Carol Lee
text_notes: Short application. Says "self-employed" and mentions freelance work; no steady employer listed. Tone is vague and does not provide documentation. I had one defaulted loan in 2019.

name: David Patel
text_notes: Stable corporate employment for 15 years. Recently paid off a car loan and maintains conservative spending. I had a single late payment five years ago but otherwise perfect history.

name: Erin Sanders
text_notes: Applying for personal loan to cover unexpected surgery expenses. My hospital bills caused missed payments for 3 months, but I'm on a repayment plan and my employer confirmed continued salary.

name: Frank Ngo
text_notes: Business loan request. Several suppliers report unpaid balances; my tone in the essay is defensive and I repeatedly ask for urgent approval. Cashflow has been negative for two months.

name: Grace O.
text_notes: College loan consolidation. I emphasize repayment intent and show a reliable part-time job. I have small credit card balances but no missed payments.

name: Henry Wu
text_notes: Application contains inconsistent statements: earlier paragraph says full-time employment, later says part-time contracting. There are contradictions about employment history and income stability.

name: Isha Khan
text_notes: Applying for an investor loan. Strong assets, long history of high income, low leverage. Conservative tone, clear financial statements attached.

name: Jack Rivera
text_notes: Requesting loan for seasonal inventory. Mentions previous bankruptcy but also recent recovery; some sentences minimize previous issues. Tone is mixedâ€”both apologetic and defensive.

name: Karen Silva
text_notes: Small business owner seeking credit to bridge payroll during a slow season. Provides specific invoices and a plan to repay in 4 months. Mentions one supplier dispute that delayed payments.

name: Liam Chen
text_notes: Applying for a startup microloan. Essay is optimistic, outlines business model, but lacks detail on revenue projections. Mentions 'rapid growth' repeatedly without numbers.

name: Maya Patel
text_notes: Need loan for home improvements; I have steady income but also mention a recent medical leave and a short reduction in hours. Credit history largely positive.

name: Noah Brown
text_notes: Multiple short sentences, erratic punctuation, and phrases like 'can't pay' and 'urgent' appear; shows high emotional language and a pleading tone.

name: Olivia Green
text_notes: Applying for consolidation of credit cards. Mentions strong savings and a planned promotion next quarter. Evidence of discipline in budget planning and recent large payment towards principal.
